sect1.title: System Requirements
sect1.para: What you need to run BEEN

listitem.para: Tomcat v.6.0. or higher to run the web interface
R for statistical computation (r-evaluator-task and generic-r-evaluator)
SVN or CVS client for the respective download tasks
Apache Ant v.1.7. for building BEEN source
Linux for running the BEEN Command Line Interface
Linux, Solaris or Windows for system load monitoring
